#summary Java Interface to the Twitter User API.

= Introduction =

tweet4j offers a UserApi interface to the methods of the [ Twitter API] that require user authentication.

= Details =

The UserApi interface extends the UserApi interface, offering all of those available methods and also the methods that require user authentication.
